NUnit is a unit-testing framework for all .Net languages.
http://www.nunit.org

currently used version: 3.4.1
from: https://github.com/nunit/nunit/releases/tag/3.4.1

License according to https://github.com/nunit/nunit/blob/master/README.md:
NUnit is Open Source software and NUnit 3.0 is released under the MIT license. Earlier releases used the NUnit license. Both of these licenses allow the use of NUnit in free and commercial applications and libraries without restrictions.

==================================================================================
NUnitForms compiled from SVN, with modifications which are available in our src subdirectory
Make sure to copy the same nunit.framework.dll from ThirdParty/NUnit to nunitforms\nunitforms\lib\nant to avoid mismatching version numbers
